system.description:
Chests are reinforced wooden boxes with lids and sides that are made tight to prevent anything from getting out or into the box. The price is for a box with integrated lock and strong metal reinforcements.

Coin Capacity: 25k

Dimensions: 24" x 16" x 16"

Volume: 6,144 cubic inches

Empty Weight: ~20 lbs (wood and metal reinforcements)
